SpriteFactory.CollisionType

Enumeration

Types of collisions.

Values

 

  
Name Int Value Description
Collider 0 Collision with a Collider or Collider2D
Trigger 1 Collision with a Trigger or Trigger2D
Particle 2 Collision with a particle
Mouse 3 Collision with the mouse
